summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the period of July 1, 2014, to July 31, 2014. It includes information about account balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned. The statement reflects a balance of $6,290.37 at the end of the period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of July 31, 2014, was $6,290.37.
The account had an interest payment of $1.07 for the period.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees for the statement period.
The annual percentage yield earned on the account was 0.20%.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the statement.
